intro: I am an entrepreneurial software engineer passionate about leveraging AI to solve high-impact real-world problems and driving innovation. I enjoy working on challenging engineering problems and learning new technology every day. I also love traveling, cooking and drawing.

educations.description: Relevant coursework: Machine learning, Deep learning, Reinforcement learning, Large language models, Data structures, Algorithms, Cloud-native architecture & microservices, Web development, Computer vision, NLP, Classical AI (state-space search, evolutionary algorithms, optimization, bayesian networks, symbolic AI).

Gained expertise in full-stack technology of autonomous driving software, covering deep learning, computer vision, sensor fusion (camera + LiDAR), SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping), path planning, trajectory optimization and control.

expertise.title: ðŸ’» Full-Stack Software Dev
expertise.description: Skilled in building scalable web applications using modern technologies like FastAPI, Django, React, Next.js and TailWindCSS. Extensive experience in cloud-native architecture (AWS & GCP), microservices, and DevOps tools like Docker, Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines.

expertise.title: ðŸ§  ML & AI
expertise.description: Experienced in developing AI/ML solutions, with expertise in GenAI, AI Agents, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and computer vision. Strong background in developing data pipelines, training & fine-tuning ML models using TensorFlow, PyTorch & Hugging Face and deploying models for inference.

expertise.title: ðŸ¦¾ Robotics
expertise.description: Experienced in robotics and autonomous systems, with expertise in perception, motion planning, and control. Skilled in training computer vision and reinforcement learning models for robotic applications using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and OpenCV.

experiences.description: Employee #10 at an early-stage startup, developing a network productivity iOS app. Built backend for contact grouping, AI-powered message generation, OAuth authentication, and Stripe payments. Deployed the app on the Apple Store.

Developed a web app using React and ExpressJS to provide high school students with driving training tutorials and quizzes to enhance hazard perception. Integrated driving simulation modules for hands-on training. The app is currently deployed in Washington, D.C., serving over 2,000 students.
Doubled student membership YoY through several initiatives inluding AI workshops, live coding demos, Kaggle competitions, industry speaker sessions and research projects.

Built a full pipeline automating web scraping and clustering of 50,000 documents by signature, achieving 92% accuracy and reducing the project timeline from 1 year to 3 months. Used YOLO V11, ConvNext and KMeans for feature extraction and clustering.

Led a team to develop a web app translating American Sign Language into AI-generated English voice in real-time. Integrated Google Mediapipe CV model for hand pose estimation, a fine-tuned vision transformer for gesture classification, and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech. Secured $12,000 in funding, participated in two incubators, and won a $2,000 judge prize at Spark Showcase.
Developed a software tool to automate design workflow by 10x, designed the Cybertruck wiper system & Model 3 pedestrian safety system, and invented a wiper mechanism (Intl. Patent WO2023107343).

projects.title: AI Research Trends Dashboard
projects.description: Developed FastAPI microservices with SQS queueing to automate daily ingestion, embedding & clustering of research papers. Used Kubernetes to deploy Docker containers & Amplify to host frontend.

projects.title: LLM RAG Chatbot App
projects.description: Designed & deployed a RAG app with a chatbot interface, leveraging LangChain for an agentic framework, Llama model for LLM, Pinecone for vector database, and FastAPI + Next.js + TailwindCSS for web development.
projects.frontpic: LLM RAG Chatbot App - Front Pic.png

projects.title: Job Search AI Agent
projects.description: Built an event-driven architecture for a job search and resume generation platform using AWS Lambda & EventBridge. Integrated LangChain with ChatGPT for dynamic API calls and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

projects.title: CNN Object Detection for Self-Driving Cars
projects.description: Trained CNNs with TensorFlow for object detection & classification in urban environments and conducted experiments with hyperparameters & data augmentations to enhance model performance. Applied sensor fusion techniques, integrating 3D lidar point clouds with 2D camera data, along with Extended Kalman Filters & scan matching algorithms for multi-vehicle tracking & localization. Implemented tracking, motion-planning & trajectory-optimization algorithms, including PID controllers & finite state machines, to predict & execute vehicle behavior in CARLA Simulator.
projects.frontpic: Self-Driving Car Object Detection - Front Pic.gif

projects.title: Multi-Agent LLM System for Stock Trading
projects.description: Developed a multi-agent LLM system to manage a portfolio of stocks with different risk profiles. Implemented specialized AI agents for technical quantitative analysis, qualitative analysis from SEC filings (10-k documents), macroeconomic data analysis and stock news + social media sentiment analysis.

projects.title: American Sign Language to English Voice Translation
projects.description: Led a team to develop a web app translating American Sign Language into AI-generated English voice in real-time. Integrated Google Mediapipe CV model for hand pose estimation, a fine-tuned vision transformer for gesture classification, and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech. Secured $12,000 in funding, participated in two incubators, and won a $2,000 judge prize at Spark Showcase..

projects.title: Concrete Strength Prediction using KNN
projects.description: Developed a Streamlit app to predict concrete compressive strength using the K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm. Implemented an interactive UI for parameter selection and data visualization, including a parallel coordinates plot to analyze feature contributions.

projects.title: Training Neural Networks for Classification & Regression
projects.description: Conducted an experimental study on the performance of neural networks for classification and regression tasks across various datasets. Compared linear networks and non-linear feedforward networks with and without autoencoder pre-training. Evaluated models on healthcare, automotive, and environmental datasets, demonstrating the superiority of non-linear networks, especially those pre-trained with autoencoders.

projects.title: Reinforcement Learning Agent Maze Navigation
projects.description: Analyzed the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms, including Value Iteration, Q-learning, and SARSA, across diverse race track and environmental settings with wall collisions. Evaluated algorithm strengths and weaknesses in handling complex scenarios, revealing Value Iterationâ€™s robustness in simple environments and Q-learning and SARSAâ€™s challenges in harsher conditions.

projects.title: Health Data AI-Platform
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven platform that leverages daily health data from Apple Watch + patient diary logs for diet, exercise and symptoms to empower doctors with diagnostic insights.

projects.title: LLM Training Cost, Time, and Energy Calculator
projects.description: Implemented formulas from an LLM scaling laws paper to estimate the cost, training time, and energy consumption required to train a transformer model given perplexity, training tokens, GPU specifications, and floating-point precision. Analyzed the compute-optimal scaling strategy proposed in the Chinchilla paper, demonstrating how model size and dataset size should scale equally to maximize efficiency under a fixed compute budget.

projects.title: Autonomous Pool Playing Robot
projects.description: Led software development of a fully autonomous pool-playing robot. Trained a CCN using TensorFlow for object detection of cue balls and pockets. Implemented a trajectory optimization algorithm in MATLAB to determine optimal shot for robot to execute and built a physics-based model for generating required motor torque.

projects.title: Online Multiplayer Clue Game
projects.description: Developed an online multiplayer version of the classic Clue game, featuring real-time player interaction, game state management, and cloud-based hosting. Technologies include UI rendering, game logic engine, data layer for player profiles and multimedia, and API communication for seamless gameplay.
